1161450.name: 打鬼原声带vol.1 老宅豪门
1161450.description:
The door of old mansion－Pagui soundtrack album

Fleshjuicer X ArtnerdGames
Fleshjuicer:Feisty and fierce, Flesh Juicer is an awesome metal band from Taichung.
ArtnerdGames:Talented and young, ArtnerdGames produces music for Flesh Juicer’s Album, The Door of Old Mansion.

Pagui soundtrack album, showing you the stage of The door of old mansion
1.Old Door
2.Madam’s Piano
3.Dancing in the air
4.The night of the old door closed
5.We’re home, my dear
6.Turn on the Sun (PaGui edition)
7.Turn the Sun off (PaGui edition)
8.UFO TOUR (PaGui edition)
9.Funeral (PaGui edition)
10.UFO TOUR REST(PaGui edition)
